document_data.name: Pavel Tragosk
document_data.mainbody: '''Pavel Tragosk''' was a [[Raumviran]] elected official and inhabitant of [[Drubiev]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities: Pavel was a member of the [[Council of Five (Drubiev)|Council of Five]]. He was an outspoken voice for a portion of the population of Drubiev who supported expanding their city's influence through trade along the [[Golden Way]]. He used the lure of wealth and power to help swing votes toward his cause.
